      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Convert the given Bitmap image to a String in base64 format.

        If the given image is null, return null.

        Parameters:
        image - the image to convert
        Returns:
        the image in base64 format as a String

      • toBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap toBitmap(java.lang.String imageBase64)
        Convert the given String to a Bitmap image.

        Return null if the String is null or could not be converted.

        Parameters:
        imageBase64 - the image in base64 format as a String
        Returns:
        the converted image
